channel.title: PostgreSQL on Uday | Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in PostgreSQL on Uday | Portfolio

item.title: Enterprise API Key Management System
item.description: Built a comprehensive API key management system with role-based access control, multi-key support, and advanced security features including account protection and audit logging.

item.title: Enterprise ETL Pipeline
item.description: Built a modular ETL system that reduces manual data collection time by 90%, extracting data from multiple sources via APIs and browser automation into a unified PostgreSQL warehouse.
